description.narrative:
Increased access to finance: IFC's investment will provide much-needed funding to the SME sector, particularly WOEs and BEEOEs, through a bank which is completely focused on this segment. It will help SMEs grow and stabilize their businesses, create more jobs and contribute more effectively to boosting productive economic activity.
Competitiveness: IFC's investment will support the sustainable growth of the Bank, ensuring that it continues to promote SME lending in the South African banking sector. In particular, this will be the first bank in South Africa specifically allocating a portion of the funding to WOEs and BEEOEs.
